Detailed Description

This is CommSRP (Selectively Reliable Protocol), a datagram packet-based transport class.

Attention
Copyright (c) Tiburon Entertainment / Electronic Arts 1999-2003. ALL RIGHTS RESERVED.
Version
0.5 01/03/03 (JLB) Initial Version, based on CommTCP
0.7 01/07/03 (JLB) Working unreliable transport, based on CommUDP
0.8 01/08/03 (JLB) Working reliable transport.
0.9 02/09/03 (JLB) Added support for sending zero-byte packets, and fixed PS2 alignment issue.

Enumeration Type Documentation

anonymous enum

control packet types

Enumerator
CTRL_PACKET_FIRST 

16: beginning of packet code range

CTRL_PACKET_INIT 

16: init packet

CTRL_PACKET_POKE 

17: firewall poke packet

CTRL_PACKET_CONN 

18: connection confirmation packet

CTRL_PACKET_KEEP 

19: keep-alive packet

CTRL_PACKET_DISC 

20: connection terminated packet

CTRL_PACKET_LAST 

63: end of packet code range
